short_summary: Procurement of Qty 3x Golf Carts, 4 Passengers and ILS deliverables for delivery to CFB Montreal, Quebec.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure... (full description in attachment)
full_summary:
**Tender for Golf Carts with ILS Deliverables**
=====================================================

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01007314
**Amendment Number:** 7
**Solicitation Number:** W8476-236653/A
**Publication Date:** September 15, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 14, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the procurement of Golf Carts with ILS deliverables. The contract will be awarded to a single supplier who will be responsible for supplying three (3) units with four passengers.

**Key Details:**

* Contract type: Procurement
* Procurement type: Competitive
* Procurement method: Open bidding
* Duration: 120 days after contract award

**Contract Requirements:**
The following is a list of key components:

* Three (3) units of Golf carts with four passengers
* ILS deliverables for the CFB Montreal location
* Date of delivery: 120 days after contract award

**Language and Documents:**
Documents may be provided in either English or French. Suppliers must comply with the rules and regulations of the Crown's procurement process.

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Geographical Scope:**
The contract will be executed within Canada.

**Tender Status:** Exired
**Attachments:**
The following attachments are available for download:

* [W8476-236653-A_Original.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/15/b46e206556f0db08a26f9b2e90bafdbe/en_rfp_w8476-236653-a_original.pdf)
* [W8476-236653-A_Amendment_001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/12/33870aaffe4af0826257167231a72e65/en_rfp_w8476-236653-a_amendment_001.pdf)

**Contact Information:**
This RFP is coordinated by:

* Geniève Roach, DLP 5-3-4-6
* Email: genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca

Note that the rewritten entry preserves all the relevant information, but it is presented in a more professional
